fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-If that player is a member of a good faction, nothing happens.
-if that player is a member of the REF, they will join as a random town role
-They fear they will be hunted by their former members, so they will not be able to speak until their former faction is dead and can’t whisper. They may still vote, but this vote will not be announced to the town
-You will not learn if you successfully convert them
